attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public
attributes.additional_details: every year the use of fireworks  causes untold amount of stress to animals. antisocial behavior and injury's to people. its time we ended this.
attributes.background: ban the sale of fireworks to the public. but still allow private sale to organised events

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
